name: neon-testing
description: A Vitest utility for seamless integration tests with Neon Postgres
author: Mikael Lirbank

scripts.check: bun run build && bunx vitest run && bunx prettier --check .
scripts.release:patch: bun run check && bun pm version patch && bun publish --tag latest
scripts.release:minor: bun run check && bun pm version minor && bun publish --tag latest
scripts.release:major: bun run check && bun pm version major && bun publish --tag latest
scripts.release:beta: bun run check && bun pm version prerelease --preid=beta && bun publish --tag beta
